title: ITablePatternFeatureData.IGetPatternFaceArray
description: Gets the patterned faces in this table-driven pattern feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of patterned faces VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
